Jx.Field.Date

Provides a field to select a valid date value using a Date Picker

Example

new Jx.Field.Date({
    label: 'Start Date',
    value: '05/05/1984',
    format: '%m/%d/%Y'
})

Extends

Jx.Field

Author: Ing.  Axel Mendoza Pupo.
